com.cleo.lexicom.external

Interface IHostActionController

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IActionController, java.rmi.Remote
    Deprecated.

    @Deprecated
public interface IHostActionController
extends IActionController
    Establishes an interface for sequentially issuing host host action commands and streaming throughput. This class has been deprecated - just use the more general IActionController. Refer to ILexiCom.getHostActionController(String[]).

    • Method Summary

      • Methods inherited from interface com.cleo.lexicom.external.IActionController
